Module kivakit.serialization.kryo
Package com.telenav.kivakit.serialization.kryo

Class KryoSerializer<Value>

java.lang.Object
com.esotericsoftware.kryo.Serializer<Value>
com.telenav.kivakit.serialization.kryo.KryoSerializer<Value>
public abstract class KryoSerializer<Value> extends com.esotericsoftware.kryo.Serializer<Value>
Kryo serializer extension class for serializing a particular type of object. Provides a thread-local version to subclasses that is set with version(Version) and retrieved in subclasses with version().
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
